name: Fire Disaster Simulation VR
description:
Fire Disaster Simulation VR is a project developed for our final assignment, this game has 2 modes, fire extinguishing simulation and fire evacuation simulation. 
The fire extinguishing simulation allows the player to learn how to properly and effectively extinguish fires using the available fire fighting tools. 
Meanwhile, the evacuation simulation requires the player to make quick decisions and find a safe exit when a fire occurs. 
This game is designed to help players increase their knowledge and awareness in emergency situations and be better prepared to handle fires if they occur in real life.

After you've played and experience, please spare your time to fill out this questionnaire form to evaluate our game: https://forms.gle/mHTSbcicdGp9dvLe6

Thank you for trying and playing our game!!!
